attributes.action: Traffic lights on the junction of Kathleen Road and south east road in Sholing.
attributes.additional_details: There has been so many accidents on this road and I think now the safest thing to do would make it traffic light controlled. After the road lay out was changed this resulted in accidents because people were used to the old way then they added speed bumps which have done nothing. There used to be a lolly pop lady to help people cross but its now to dangerous for that. This accident changed my mums life and it's time it's fixed!!!
attributes.background: My mum and sister were involved in a serious accident on this junction which resulted in my mum being cut out of her car and air ambulance being called this happened on 12 October 2014 since then lots more accidents happened including today 13th April 2017.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
